entry.title: 打字游戏
entry.content: 一个真正的网页项目从来不是一个HTML文件所能表示的（如百度主页实战笔记、3d轮播图那样），而是有许许多多的模块组成。软件设计方面的最高要求————高内聚低耦合，同样也适用于网页。高内聚低耦合是判断设计好坏的标准，主要是面向对象的设计，主要看类的内聚性、耦合度。内聚性：块内联系，模块内部各元素联系的紧密度越高内聚性越高。耦合度：块间联系，各个模块之间联系的紧密度越低其耦合度越低。本次的打字游戏我们将其分成Html、Js、Css三个部分。在HTML中以link引用Css文件，以script引用Js。 Html👉效果展示1234567891011121314151617<!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en"><head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>打字游戏</title> <link rel="stylesheet" href="index.css"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="animate.css"></head><body> <h1>打&#x3000;字&#x3000;游&#x3000;戏</h1> <main>游戏用时：<b>00</b>s</main> <div id="start">Ready</div> <div id="char">A</div> <section>您的正确率为：<span>100</span>%</section> <script src="index.js"></script></body></html> Js12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243444546474849505152535455565758596061626364656667686970717273var start = document.querySelector('#start')var times = document.querySelector('b')var main = document.querySelector('main')var char = document.querySelector('#char')var sec = document.querySelector('section')var span = document.querySelector('span')var counterStartingvar resetTime = 0var randomCharvar total = 0var right = 0start.onclick = function(){ this.className = 'bounceOutLeft animated' setTimeout(function(){ this.hidden = true }.bind(this),500) setTimeout(function(){ char.style.display = 'block' changeChar() char.className = "bounceInRight animated" },600) setTimeout(removeClass,1100) setTimeout(function(){ main.style.display = 'block' counterStarting = setInterval(counter,10) },1000) setTimeout(function(){ gameOver() },100000) char.className = 'bounceInRight animated' setTimeout(removeClass,500) window.onkeyup = function(event){ if(total >= 30){ gameOver() } else{ sec.style.display = 'block' if(randomChar === event.key.toUpperCase()){ char.className = 'bounceInRight animated' changeChar() setTimeout(removeClass,500) right++ total++ span.innerHTML = (right / total * 100).toFixed(2) } else{ char.className = 'wobble animated' setTimeout(removeClass,500) total++ span.innerHTML = (right / total * 100).toFixed(2) } } }}// 切换字母的函数function changeChar(){ var randomNum = Math.floor(Math.random() * 26) + 65 randomChar = String.fromCharCode(randomNum) char.innerHTML = randomChar}// 计时器函数function counter(){ resetTime++ times.innerHTML = resetTime / 100}function removeClass(){ char.className = ''}function gameOver(){ clearInterval(counterStarting) char.innerHTML = 'Game Over'} Css12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031body{ background-color: #FFFFFF; color: black; text-align: center; text-shadow: 0 0 50px black; -moz-user-select: none}main{ text-align: left; width: 130px; margin: 0 auto; color: darkorange; display: none;}h1{ font-size: 35px; cursor: default;}div{ width: 300px; margin: 26vh auto; font-size: 100px; cursor: pointer;}#char{ display: none;}section{ display: none; color: springgreen;} 版权声明 Forward’s Notes by Forward Step is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 International License.由Forward Step创作并维护的Forward’s Notes博客采用创作共用保留署名-非商业-禁止演绎4.0国际许可证。 本文首发于Forward’s Notes博客（ http://stepforward.top ），版权所有，侵权必究。本文永久链接：http://stepforward.top/2017/04/16/打字游戏/

entry.title: 3D轮播图
entry.content: 代码实例：👉效果展示123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354555657585960616263646566676869707172737475767778798081828384858687888990919293949596<!DOCTYPE html><html lang="en"><head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>3D轮播图</title> <style> main{ perspective: 900px; } section{ width: 200px; height: 100px; margin: 35vh auto; transform-style: preserve-3d; transition: all 1s; } img{ width: 200px; height: 100px; position: absolute; } img:nth-child(1){ transform: translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(2){ transform: rotateY(40deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(3){ transform: rotateY(80deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(4){ transform: rotateY(120deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(5){ transform: rotateY(160deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(6){ transform: rotateY(200deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(7){ transform: rotateY(240deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(8){ transform: rotateY(280deg) translateZ(300px); } img:nth-child(9){ transform: rotateY(320deg) translateZ(300px); } button{ width: 60px; height: 30px; background-color: #3388FF; color: white; border: 0; } div{ width: 130px; margin: 10vh auto; } </style></head><body> <main> <section> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/1.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/2.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/3.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/4.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/5.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/6.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/7.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/8.jpg" alt=""> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/3Dlb/9.jpg" alt=""> </section> </main> <div> <button id="prev"><</button> <button id="next">></button> </div> <script> var main = document.querySelector('main') var sec = document.querySelector('section') var pre = document.getElementById('prev') var next = document.getElementById('next') var deg = 0 pre.onclick = function(){ deg = deg - 40 sec.style.transform = 'rotateY(' + deg + 'deg)' } next.onclick = function(){ deg = deg + 40 sec.style.transform = 'rotateY(' + deg + 'deg)' } </script></body></html> 版权声明 Forward’s Notes by Forward Step is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 International License.由Forward Step创作并维护的Forward’s Notes博客采用创作共用保留署名-非商业-禁止演绎4.0国际许可证。 本文首发于Forward’s Notes博客（ http://stepforward.top ），版权所有，侵权必究。本文永久链接：http://stepforward.top/2017/04/11/3D轮播图/

entry.title: 百度主页实战笔记
entry.content: 代码实例：👉效果展示<!DocTYPE html><html> <head> <meta charset="UTF-8"> <title>百度一下，你就知道</title> <style> .container{ width: 88%; margin: 0 auto; } nav{ /*设置上边距的距离：20px*/ margin-top: 20px; /*设置文本对齐：右对齐*/ text-align: right; /*位置：相对定位*/ position: relative; } nav>div{ /*设置右边距：12px*/ margin-right:12px; /*显示：同行显示风格*/ display: inline-block; } nav div a{ /*字体大小：13px*/ font-size: 13px; /*设置字体颜色*/ color: #333333; /*字体粗细：粗体*/ font-weight:bold; } /*设置鼠标悬浮状态：字体变蓝色*/ nav div a:hover{ color:blue; } nav .more-goods{ /*显示：同行显示风格*/ display: inline-block; /*宽度：64px*/ width: 64px; /*高度：20px*/ height: 20px; /*背景颜色*/ background-color:#3388FF; /*设置字体大小*/ font-size: 13px; /*文本对齐：居中对齐*/ text-align: center; } nav .more-goods a{ color: white; } nav #list{ width: 66px; height: 100px; /*添加边框*/ border: 1px solid lightgray; font-size: 12px; text-align: center; line-height: 25px; /*添加阴影*/ box-shadow: 0px 0px 1px gray; /*游标：指示*/ cursor: pointer; /*位置：绝对定位*/ position: absolute; right: 60px; top: 30px; /*显示：隐藏*/ display: none; } nav #list span{ display: inline-block; width: 14px; height: 10px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/5.png); background-position: -912px -146px; position: absolute; top: -10px; left: 26px; } nav #list div:hover{ background-color: #3388FF; color: white; } .logo{ text-align: center; } .logo img{ width: 260px; height: 120px; } form div{ width: 642px; margin: 0 auto; position: relative; } form div input{ width: 500px; height: 35px; border: 1px solid lightgray; padding-right: 40px; } form div input:focus{ border: 1px solid #3388FF; } form div button{ height: 39px; width: 93px; border: 0; background-color: #3388FF; color: white; margin-left: -5px; } footer{ text-align: center; margin-top: 30vh; font-size: 12px; color: gray; } footer .phone{ margin-top: 4px; } footer .margin-t{ margin-top: 10px; } footer a{ color: gray; } footer .margin-l a, footer .margin-t .police-margin{ margin-left: 8px; } footer .margin-t .address, footer .margin-t .police{ display: inline-block; width: 15px; height: 15px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/5.png); } footer .margin-t .address{ background-position: -600px -95px; } footer .margin-t .police{ background-position: -622px -95px; } form div span{ display: inline-block; width: 18px; height: 18px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/3.png); position: absolute; right: 110px; top: 11px; cursor: pointer; } aside{ padding-top: 22px; width: 84px; height: 923px; background-color: #F9F9F9; position: absolute; right: 0px; top: 0; font-size: 13px; text-align: center; display: none; } aside .light-box{ cursor: pointer; width: 76%; margin: 0 auto; } aside .light-box>div{ padding: 8px 0; border-top: 1px solid lightgray; } aside .light-box>div:first-child{ margin-top: 12px; } aside .light-box>div:last-child{ border-bottom: 1px solid lightgray; margin-bottom: 12px; } aside a{ font-size: 13px; color: gray; } aside .light-box .music, aside .light-box .image, aside .light-box .know, aside .light-box .book, aside .light-box .wind{ display: inline-block; width: 36px; height: 36px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/1.png); } aside .light-box .music{ width: 42px; background-position: -72px 0; } aside .light-box .image{ background-position: -113px 0; } aside .light-box .know{ background-position: -36px 0; } aside .light-box .book{ background-position: -149px 0; } aside .light-box .wind{ background-position: -185px 0; } main{ display: none; } main .modal{ width: 100%; height: 100%; background-color: black; position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; opacity: 0.5; } main .form-box{ width: 393px; height: 448px; background-color: white; position: absolute; top: calc((100% - 448px)/2); left: calc((100% - 393px)/2); } main .form-box h3{ background-color: #F7F7F7; margin: 0; padding: 10px 20px; } main .form-box h3 .baidu-logo{ width: 25px; height: 30px; display: inline-block; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/7.png); vertical-align: bottom; } main .form-box h3 #close{ color: #3388FF; display: inline-block; border: 1px solid #3388FF; border-radius: 50%; padding: 1px 5px 1px 5px; position: absolute; right: 20px; font-size: 15px; top: 15px; cursor: pointer; } main .form-box h3 #close:hover{ color: red; border-color: red; } main .form-box .message-signin{ font-size: 12px; text-align: right; margin: 20px 0; } main .form-box .message-signin span:nth-child(1){ display: inline-block; width: 9px; height: 15px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/6.png); vertical-align: middle; } main .form-box .message-signin span:nth-child(2):hover{ color:#3388FF; text-decoration: underline; cursor: pointer; } main .form-box .container .first-input{ position: relative; margin-bottom: 20px; } main .form-box .container .first-input input{ width: calc(99% - 31px); height: 40px; border: 1px solid lightgray; padding-left: 31px; } main .form-box .container .first-input span{ display: inline-block; width: 25px; height: 25px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/8.png); position: absolute; top: 9px; left: 3px; } main .form-box .container .one span{ background-position: 0 -69px; } main .form-box .container .two span{ background-position: 0 -148px; } main .form-box .container .first-input input:focus{ border-color: #3388FF; } main .form-box .container .next-signin{ font-size: 12px; margin: 20px 0; } main .form-box .container .next-signin span{ float: right; color: #3388FF; } main .form-box .container .next-signin span:hover, main .form-box .container .register-now span:hover, .reverse-face span:hover{ text-decoration: underline; cursor: pointer; } main .form-box .container .next-signin input{ vertical-align: -2px; } main .form-box .container .submit-button input{ width: 100%; height: 38px; border: 0; background-color: #3388FF; color: white; } main .form-box .container .register-now{ text-align: right; font-size: 12px; margin: 20px 0; } main .form-box .container .register-now span{ color: #3388FF; } hr{ width: 113.75%; border-top: 0; margin-left: -23px; } main .form-box .container .other-signin{ font-size: 12px; } main .form-box .container .other-signin span, #toggle-modal{ display: inline-block; width: 25px; height: 25px; background-image: url(http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/9.png); } main .form-box .container .other-signin span:nth-of-type(1){ background-position: -63px 0; } main .form-box .container .other-signin span:nth-of-type(2){ background-position: -88px 0; margin-left: 10px; } #toggle-modal{ position: absolute; right: 0; bottom: 0; width: 40px; height: 40px; background-position: -46px -90px; } .reverse-face{ text-align: center; margin-top: 10vh; display: none; } .reverse-face p{ font-size: 13px; } .reverse-face img{ width: 100px; height: 100px; } .reverse-face div{ padding: 5px; border: 1px solid; width: 100px; height: 100px; margin: 0 auto; } .reverse-face span{ color: #3388FF; } </style> </head> <body> <nav> <!--a标签是跳转网站的 href是网址--> <div><a href="https://www.nuomi.com/?cid=002540">糯米</a></div> <div><a href="http://news.baidu.com/">新闻</a></div> <div><a href="https://www.hao123.com/?tn=97103350_hao_pg">hao123</a></div> <div><a href="http://map.baidu.com/">地图</a></div> <div><a href="http://v.baidu.com/?fr=bd">视频</a></div> <div><a href="https://tieba.baidu.com/index.html">贴吧</a></div> <div><a id="open-modal" href="#">登录</a></div> <div id="show-list"><a href="#">设置</a></div> <section class="more-goods"><a href="#">更多产品</a></section> <section id="list"> <span></span> <div>搜索设置</div> <div>高级搜索</div> <div>关闭预测</div> <div>搜索历史</div> </section> </nav> <p class="logo"> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/2.png" alt="百度logo"> </p> <form action="#"> <div> <input type="text"> <span id="camera"></span> <button>百度一下</button> </div> </form> <footer> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/4.png" alt="百度二维码"> <div class="phone"><b>手机百度</b></div> <div class="margin-t margin-l"> <a href="#">把百度设为首页</a> <a href="#">关于百度</a> <a href="#">About Baidu</a> <a href="#">百度推广</a> </div> <div class="margin-t"> <span> ©2017 Baidu <a href="#">使用百度前必读</a> <a href="#">意见反馈</a> 京ICP证030173号 </span> <span class="address"></span> <span class="police-margin"> 京公安网安备11000002000001号 </span> <span class="police"></span> </div> </footer> <aside> <div>更多产品</div> <div class="light-box"> <div> <span class="music"></span> <div>音乐</div> </div> <div> <span class="image"></span> <div>图片</div> </div> <div> <span class="know"></span> <div>知道</div> </div> <div> <span class="book"></span> <div>文库</div> </div> <div> <span class="wind"></span> <div>风云榜</div> </div> </div> <div><a href="#">全部产品>></a></div> </aside> <main> <div class="modal"></div> <div class="form-box"> <h3> <span class="baidu-logo"></span> 登录百度账号 <span id="close">X</span> </h3> <div class="reverse-face"> <h4>手机扫描，安全登录</h4> <div> <img src="http://ohaveqo1g.bkt.clouddn.com/image/baidu/4.png" alt=""> </div> <p>请使用<span>手机百度app</span>扫描登录</p> </div> <div class="container"> <p class="message-signin"> <span></span> <span>短信快捷登录</span> </p> <div class="first-input one"> <span></span> <input id="user" type="text" placeholder="手机/邮箱/用户名"> </div> <div class="first-input two"> <span></span> <input id="password" type="password" placeholder="密码"> </div> <div class="next-signin"> <input type="checkbox" id="check"> <label for="check">下次自动登录</label> <span>登录遇到问题</span> </div> <div class="submit-button"> <input type="button" value="登录"> </div> <div class="register-now"> <span>立即注册</span> </div> <hr> <div class="other-signin"> <p>可用以下方式登录</p> <span></span> <span></span> </div> </div> <span id="toggle-modal"></span> </div> </main> <script> // alert(window.innerHeight) var showList = document.querySelector('#show-list') var list = document.querySelector('#list') var camera = document.querySelector('#camera') var spans = document.querySelectorAll('aside .light-box>div') var moreGood = document.querySelector('.more-goods') var aside = document.querySelector('aside') var userInput = document.getElementById('user') var passwordInput = document.getElementById('password') var toggleModal = document.getElementById('toggle-modal') var pagel = document.querySelector('.container') var page2 = document.querySelector('.reverse-face') var closeModal = document.getElementById('close') var openModal = document.getElementById('open-modal') var modal = document.querySelector('main') var change = true // 设置点击关闭登陆 closeModal.onclick = function(){ modal.style.display = 'none' } // 设置点击显示登陆 openModal.onclick = function() { modal.style.display = 'block' } // 设置二维码登录与账号登陆切换 toggleModal.onclick = function(){ if(change){ pagel.style.display = 'none' page2.style.display = 'block' // 账号登陆图标 this.style.backgroundPosition = '0 -90px' change = false } else{ pagel.style.display = 'block' page2.style.display = 'none' // 二维码登陆图标 this.style.backgroundPosition = '-46px -90px' change = true } } // 用户名输入框获取焦点显示蓝色风格 userInput.onfocus = function(){ this.previousElementSibling.style.backgroundPosition = '0 -109px'; } // 用户名输入框失去焦点显示默认灰色风格 userInput.onblur = function(){ this.previousElementSibling.style.backgroundPosition = '0 -69px'; } // 密码输入框获取焦点显示蓝色风格 passwordInput.onfocus = function(){ this.previousElementSibling.style.backgroundPosition = '0 -188px'; } // 密码输入框失去焦点显示默认灰色风格 password.onblur = function(){ this.previousElementSibling.style.backgroundPosition = '0 -148px'; } // 设置当鼠标进入"更多商品"显示 moreGood.onmouseenter = function(){ aside.style.display = 'block' } // 设置当鼠标离开"更多商品"隐藏 aside.onmouseleave = function(){ aside.style.display = 'none' } for(var i = 0;i < spans.length;i++){ spans[i].onmouseenter = function(){ // 设置当鼠标进入显示下划线 this.children[1].style.textDecoration = 'underline' } spans[i].onmouseleave = function(){ // 鼠标离开不显示下划线 this.children[1].style.textDecoration = 'none' } } camera.onmouseenter = function(){ this.style.backgroundPosition = '0 -20px' } camera.onmouseleave = function(){ this.style.backgroundPosition = '0 0' } // 鼠标进入"设置"显示菜单 showList.onmouseenter = function(){ list.style.display = 'block'; } // 鼠标离开"设置"隐藏菜单 showList.onmouseleave = function(){ list.style.display = 'none'; } // 列表显示与隐藏 list.onmouseenter = function(){ list.style.display = 'block'; } list.onmouseleave = function(){ list.style.display = 'none'; } </script> </body></html> 版权声明 Forward’s Notes by Forward Step is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 International License.由Forward Step创作并维护的Forward’s Notes博客采用创作共用保留署名-非商业-禁止演绎4.0国际许可证。 本文首发于Forward’s Notes博客（ http://stepforward.top ），版权所有，侵权必究。本文永久链接：http://stepforward.top/2017/04/06/百度主页实战笔记/

entry.title: 归途
entry.content: 原创于2015年9月1日那南飞的大雁是否还记得来时的路饥饿 疲惫寒冷 病痛不断袭卷着它一路坎坷 一路艰辛一路风雨 一路磨难却从未改变它的信仰只因 那北方 才是它的家 版权声明 Forward’s Notes by Forward Step is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 International License.由Forward Step创作并维护的Forward’s Notes博客采用创作共用保留署名-非商业-禁止演绎4.0国际许可证。 本文首发于Forward’s Notes博客（ http://stepforward.top ），版权所有，侵权必究。本文永久链接：http://stepforward.top/2016/11/30/归途/

entry.title: 写给我所有的高中同学
entry.content: 原创于2015年1月14日 致我亲爱的高中同学 对于大学生活，我不知道该说什么，也不知道想说什么，生活从来都像死水一样平静。吃饭、睡懒觉、玩手机，无限的重复着；拖着疲惫的身体看了看身边的学习学生，翻身继续睡。明白自己在堕落，却又甘心堕落，曾戏笑自己是堕落的天使，可自己又何曾是个天使？哪里有过梦想？又哪里挥洒热血努力奋斗过？静下心来总会想起曾经，不知道自己是否是个恋旧的人，我清楚的记得在高三毕业前我对一个朋友说道，“毕业后我会忘掉所有的人”，曾有一段时间我似乎真的忘记了，和所有的人都没一丝联系，甚至连想念都不曾有，我以为我就是一个冷血的人。可当我真正想念的时候，我发现我竟如此的怀念曾经，一种无来由的悲伤充斥在内心。一切都发生的那么快，清楚的记得高一开学大会上，校长说我们将在这里度过1000多个日日夜夜，一切都结束的那么快，清楚的记得我去取毕业证时许晓那落寞的身影，真实的就仿佛都发生在昨天…… 大杨帝高，当初那么的贬低你，如今却又那么的想念你，但我更想念的是曾经的亲爱的你们。想想曾经自己，那么的无知，那么的幼稚，以至于伤害了太多的人，离别来的那么快又那么突然，我甚至连对不起都来不及说。昨天班长说起暑假招生的事，我突然发现自己是那么的不愿面对曾经，即便是那熟悉的校园，都因缺少了你们，让我倍感害怕。 看看朋友的动态，都在为梦想拼搏着奋斗着，一个个都在走向成功、走向成熟的路上；再看看自己，如此的堕落与颓废，如此的不懂事，发觉我们越来越远…… 我不禁想到若干年后我们还能否再见，我不禁想到若干年后我是否还有脸去见成功的你们…… 我感谢你们，在过去的三年里，是你们给了我温暖，给了我快乐，甚至给了我父母所不能给的。在漫漫人生中，我只能在心底给予你们默默的祝福！ 版权声明 Forward’s Notes by Forward Step is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 International License.由Forward Step创作并维护的Forward’s Notes博客采用创作共用保留署名-非商业-禁止演绎4.0国际许可证。 本文首发于Forward’s Notes博客（ http://stepforward.top ），版权所有，侵权必究。本文永久链接：http://stepforward.top/2016/11/30/写给我所有的高中同学/

entry.title: 致小三
entry.content: 原创于2014年5月14日等不到青梅成酒唯有离别相送往事沉沦相遇只一瞬不舍、留恋 万事不解风情苦人心回忆纷纷扰扰 道不尽忠情难诉伤别离 犹记昨日空欢花落奈何？空相望 注：小三为朋友绰号 版权声明 Forward’s Notes by Forward Step is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 International License.由Forward Step创作并维护的Forward’s Notes博客采用创作共用保留署名-非商业-禁止演绎4.0国际许可证。 本文首发于Forward’s Notes博客（ http://stepforward.top ），版权所有，侵权必究。本文永久链接：http://stepforward.top/2016/11/30/致小三/

entry.title: 旧恋
entry.content: 原创于2013年12月31日红尘旧梦奈何如此留恋如此惆怅独留一人伤悲一个人的执念终究一场虚惘昔日花开 昨日花败今日苦思恋等不到 忘不了是寂寞还是真爱 版权声明 Forward’s Notes by Forward Step is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 International License.由Forward Step创作并维护的Forward’s Notes博客采用创作共用保留署名-非商业-禁止演绎4.0国际许可证。 本文首发于Forward’s Notes博客（ http://stepforward.top ），版权所有，侵权必究。本文永久链接：http://stepforward.top/2016/11/30/旧恋/

entry.content: 原创于2013年11月24日残枝枯叶落花暮日楚江孤鸦古柳长亭烟霞秋风天下恨伊人去天涯 版权声明 Forward’s Notes by Forward Step is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 International License.由Forward Step创作并维护的Forward’s Notes博客采用创作共用保留署名-非商业-禁止演绎4.0国际许可证。 本文首发于Forward’s Notes博客（ http://stepforward.top ），版权所有，侵权必究。本文永久链接：http://stepforward.top/2016/11/30/天净沙-离殇/

entry.title: 秋殇
entry.content: 原创于2013年10月31日秋雨尘，繁花尽。枯叶蝉，百声绝。萧风瑟瑟，夏雨雪。红烛泪落，夜尽寒。 版权声明 Forward’s Notes by Forward Step is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 International License.由Forward Step创作并维护的Forward’s Notes博客采用创作共用保留署名-非商业-禁止演绎4.0国际许可证。 本文首发于Forward’s Notes博客（ http://stepforward.top ），版权所有，侵权必究。本文永久链接：http://stepforward.top/2016/11/30/秋殇/

entry.title: 赠友人
entry.content: 原创于2013年10月14日（重阳节）暖阳残照秋日里，惠风和煦百光中。九月九日重阳日，忆的当年深厚情。生秋花月挂苍穹，日弥香星缀帷幕。快俯仰一瞬之间，乐人生若有所长。送日月伴你久安，望友谊共我长存。 版权声明 Forward’s Notes by Forward Step is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 International License.由Forward Step创作并维护的Forward’s Notes博客采用创作共用保留署名-非商业-禁止演绎4.0国际许可证。 本文首发于Forward’s Notes博客（ http://stepforward.top ），版权所有，侵权必究。本文永久链接：http://stepforward.top/2016/11/30/赠友人/

entry.title: 无题
entry.content: 原创于2013年9月24日清风萧瑟明月凄凉明月亦可断肠，秋风独我忧伤叹残情旧梦，痛心事离殇观风赏月意踌躇，揽月邀风对酒醇思慕眼前旧时雪，遥想当年新欢日可怜秋风与明月，共我长夜漫寂寥 友人赠萧瑟秋风伴我衣，凄凉月色随我影。却恨秋风扰我心，又是明月断我肠。残情旧梦犹可叹，伤心离事莫再念。享风赏月意宁静，揽风邀月诉心来。人生自古难永久，切莫再将心来伤。 版权声明 Forward’s Notes by Forward Step is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 International License.由Forward Step创作并维护的Forward’s Notes博客采用创作共用保留署名-非商业-禁止演绎4.0国际许可证。 本文首发于Forward’s Notes博客（ http://stepforward.top ），版权所有，侵权必究。本文永久链接：http://stepforward.top/2016/11/30/无题/

entry.title: 大杨帝高
entry.content: 那个校门，不能随便出入，(^_^)午间的后花园，有淡淡的日影小巧的亭子，我们打扫卫生的乐趣状元桥啊，可惜我不是状元散步的场所，那时真的好休闲开会是很讨厌，毒辣的日光清清河水，悠悠我心书山，(●’◡’●)，很高的标志————超越梦想凉亭河边名人苑漂亮吧，是个WC，O(∩_∩)O凤廊后花园凉亭综合楼之前学校的精英所在地，既是科技楼O(∩_∩)O，还是后花园优美吧校园的植物园学校最高处啊我们宿舍前(●’◡’●)，这就是我的母校——杨庄高中！ 给点赞美啊…… 版权声明 Forward’s Notes by Forward Step is licensed under a Creative Commons BY-NC-ND 4.0 International License.由Forward Step创作并维护的Forward’s Notes博客采用创作共用保留署名-非商业-禁止演绎4.0国际许可证。 本文首发于Forward’s Notes博客（ http://stepforward.top ），版权所有，侵权必究。本文永久链接：http://stepforward.top/2016/11/27/大杨帝高/
